location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to Major Robert Taylor, Political Agent at Basra, from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf

physicalDescription.extent: The letter has been struck through with a blue pencil cross.

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of a letter dated 21 June 1825, enclosing a box of dispatches for the Chief Secretary to the Government in Bombay, which Stannus will send onwards at the first opportunity.
